Research

Comparative Analysis of Scheduling Algorithms in Distributed Task Schedulers

January 12, 2025

A comprehensive study of scheduling algorithms in distributed systems, evaluating Round-Robin, FCFS, and Least-Loaded approaches using a Golang-based framework.

View Paper Code

Featured Projects

WhereToPlantAI

A data-driven Telegram bot that revolutionizes forest restoration efforts in India by providing AI-powered plantation viability predictions. Currently focused on Himachal Pradesh, it helps optimize resources and reduce waste in conservation efforts.
